Minh City Ho Chi Minh City Department of Health has just
announced two cases of suspected
botulinum toxin poisoning hospitalized at
Gia Dong Hai Hospital during the past Tet holiday,
both cases were hospitalized.  In the
case of a headache and vomiting food, through medical
history, clinical examination,
CT scan of the brain, electromyography and
other necessary tests, the doctors of the
second children's hospital have decided not to
rule out the child having the disease.  Pulin toxin poisoning so
we decided to use Pulin toxin detoxification.
Currently, the condition of two patients has
improved. One patient has been weaned from the ventilator and is being
monitored at the gastroenterology department. The remaining patient
continues to be cared for and monitored
at the hospital.  The resuscitation department showed signs of improvement. The
second children's hospital took stool
samples from two pediatric patients and sent them to the
Ho Chi Minh City Public Health Institute for
testing and prevention. Diagnosis and determination of
Pulin poisoning is a rare disease.  but it is
serious because the toxin attacks the
body's nerves, causing difficulty breathing,
muscle paralysis or even death. The golden time of
using bass medicine for patients with
poolin poisoning helps them escape the risk of
paralysis or  Ventilation is from 48 to 72 hours
during this period if the patient is on a
ventilator it will take about 5 to 7 days to
recover after taking the antidote. This

2023 European Commission has just officially launched

eu dsa digital services act

risks to public safety.

first time in history, the migration season
of red crabs on
Australia's Christmas trail started 2 months later than in
previous years, according to experts, the
reason being climate change.
Park Australia conservationist Brandon Tian
said this was the first time Red Crabs had
started migrating at the end of January and they were
migrating in low numbers. The weather in the
last 6 months of 2023 was very dry and hot with a
typical migratory smell.  will take place in
October or November. However, due to the
lack of rain, they did not make
the trip. During the breeding season,
red crabs will move in large numbers
from Phu Kien horn area. Roads
and beaches.  To mate, the female crabs stay to
see if the male crabs are left, then return to the
mainland. If there is no rain or very little rain,
they will stay still and do not pay attention
to their genetics. For those that have not gone too far, they
can come back to see the crabs.  Red possums are
endemic to Christmas Island, estimated to
number more than 100 million. Most
of the island is designated as a
national park and is
protected by the Australian government.
